# Changelog

## 1.0.0 (2026-02-25)


### Features

* adds ContentChangeEvent for backward-compatibility with go.lsp.dev/protocol. ([952ad57](https://github.com/modern-dev/go-lsp/commit/952ad574e572b906af4ada7ec0b2a068674d8387))
* adds project main code. ([6c907ff](https://github.com/modern-dev/go-lsp/commit/6c907fff800604b840dcc7c21e8864e21a7405bf))
* adds tests. ([34c5711](https://github.com/modern-dev/go-lsp/commit/34c57112f35b0ba730b44fd5e4f9c1408315cea5))
* bump Go version to 1.26; update generator to print copyright header in the generated files; minor linter tweaks. ([2d280ff](https://github.com/modern-dev/go-lsp/commit/2d280ff8eb6abd74c77827c7ff257b5d9e332c9b))
